io.github.ammar257ammar.rml

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ammar257ammar.rml.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class with static functions to be used with RML-mapper in RML mapping rules This class is meant to be used in the docker image of NanoLinksKG rmltools Docker image
    Author:
    Ammar Ammar

        public static java.lang.String hashAndJoin(java.lang.String prefix,
                                           java.lang.String strToHash)
                                    throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        A method to hash a string and concatenate it to a prefix URL string
        Parameters:
        prefix - a string value of the prefix URL
        strToHash - a string to be hashed using MD5 algorithm
        Returns:
        a string composed from the prefix URL and the MD5 hashed string
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the hashing algorithm does not exist

      • getMappings

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getMappings()
                                                                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                                           java.io.IOException
        A method to create a mapping of key strings and their corresponding IRI annotation
        Returns:
        a hash map
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - in case the IRI mapping files do not exist
        java.io.IOException - in case of IO errors

      • mapToIri

        public static java.lang.String mapToIri(java.lang.String str1,
                                        java.lang.String str2)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        A method to map a string input to the corresponding IRI
        Parameters:
        str1 - the group of the input string
        str2 - the string to get the IRI mapping for
        Returns:
        a string value of the IRI mapping
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - in case the IRI mapping files do not exist
        java.io.IOException - in case of IO errors

      • mapThenHashAndJoin

        public static java.lang.String mapThenHashAndJoin(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                  java.lang.String content,
                                                  java.lang.String mappingGroup,
                                                  java.lang.String strToMap)
                                           throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                  java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                  java.io.IOException
        A method to map a string to an IRI, hash it with another string and append the result to a prefix IRI
        Parameters:
        prefix - a string of the prefix IRI
        content - a string of the first part to be hashed
        mappingGroup - a string name of the group to obtain the IRI mapping
        strToMap - a string to be mapped to an IRI and then hashed with 'content'
        Returns:
        a string of the prefix IRI with the hashed string
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the hashing algorithm does not exist
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - in case the IRI mapping files do not exist
        java.io.IOException - in case of IO errors
